What's racism got to do with pandas? Don't they come from China? I've heard they're endangered. So they've been for the past decade or so. What about dolphins and their massacre at the cove in Taiji? Personally, after the events in Iraq, I've grown even more resentful of the American GOV'T, but if it wasn't for American PEOPLE, I would never learn about Taiji and incidents alike. As for supremacy of one nation over another my country's example should suffice as a lesson for us all, when THEY almost exterminated US because they believed their race/nation/religion is better than ours. And where we are now? We both have crumbling industry, culture, education and so on. HATRED LEAVES US IN RUINS. Besides, let's stick to our mutton..... It's good quality for the file size, but I've seen better. I only viewed this on a 1650x1080 screen, but the picture was sometimes annoyingly grainy.

Not bad though, V:7-8 considering the file size. Didn't hear anything wrong with the audio either. Good movie too, though I liked the first one better.
